name: get-ce-class
description: A universal Custom Elements class retriever

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run esm && npm test && npm run min
scripts.cjs: cp index.js cjs/ && echo 'module.exports = getCEClass;' >> cjs/index.js
scripts.esm: cp index.js esm/ && echo 'export default getCEClass;' >> esm/index.js
scripts.min: echo '/*! (c) Andrea Giammarchi - ISC */' > min.js && uglifyjs index.js -c -m >> min.js

author: Andrea Giammarchi
